All the info is in the pictures so if you are refusing to your agreed RO changes that allow me to share, please contact them directly. As discussed I’ll be
making these plans and not be seeking approval.

LocalHOOPS Training Academy
Welcome to Spring!
We are excited to announce our Spring season roll out of program offerings for the Academy. We had record numbers again this season and tryouts
did not disappoint. Thank you to all of the families who came out and participated in tryouts this season. Here is a quick run down of how
LOCALHOOPS can help develop your athlete this season:
- Spring Season Skill Development Training
- Lions League & Development League
- Spring & Summer Camps
- Spring Season Charity Bootcamp!
Spring Training Schedule
Here is our weekly training schedule for all athletes to train with us throughout the Spring season to grow their game. We offer a variety of skills
training sessions all based in the greater Bellevue area. LOCALHOOPS utilizes Punch Pass for training scheduling. This program allows you to
purchase single or packages of trainings and schedule them as you see fit.
Spring Training Schedule
Check out our Spring schedule on the link above. For all questions in regards to how trainings work please email:
training@localhoops.org
Spring Lions League
Our Spring Lions League is set to get started end of next week. This is a very popular In-House league that WILL sell out. We have boys and girls
divisions 4-9th grade. Athletes get one team training per week on Fridays & Games on Sundays, all in the greater Bellevue area. For more information
on our Lions League program check out the link below. Registration closes March 21st!
Sent:03/12/2024 at 01:50 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/12/2024 at 03:43 PM)
Subject:Local Hoops

Spring Lions League
Spring & Summer Camps
Our next camp will be our Spring Break Camp April 8-12th.  Our camps are a great way to stay active and productive over break. We have
intermediate and advanced groups for athletes to get the proper challenge. We compete in a variety of drills, scrimmages and competitions throughout
the week. Each camper leaves with some LOCALHOOPS gear and a weeks work of solid work!
Our Summer camp line up will be posted by April 1st.
For more info on camps and to register see the link below:
LOCALHOOPS Camps
LOCALHOOPS is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization and raises funds every year for our equal opportunity initiative! This program provides funding
for athletes in need who need assistance with the rising costs associated with competitive basketball. This Saturday we are kicking off Spring the right
way with a charity bootcamp at Vigor Ground Fitness in Renton, 9am-10am to support our program. If you can stop by and get a great workout, we
would love to have you, If you can not make it, and would still like to donate, here its the link below.
LOCALHOOPS Scholarship Donation
Have a great start to your Spring season and see you all in the gym!
~ The LOCALHOOPS Team
LOCALHOOPS Training Academy
localhoopsacademy@gmail.com • (425) 531-9000
https://www.localhoops.org/
LOCALHOOPS Training Academy
, Bellevue, WA
This email is being sent on behalf of LOCALHOOPS Training Academy by

that for months now so buying tickets is immaterial to me. This totals to 3 for Mom and 0 for Dad since July.
Kids, I acknowledge your assertion. I plan on following a Parenting Plan. We are supposed to have a temporary one in place immediately following
your divorce filing. Today, after working with child-focused professionals, I have shared five with you in six months.
Cabo Time Share- wrt community property, this turn is mine. You canceled my October trip when we agreed to make plans for Elsa's wedding. It was
my turn then, so we don't just skip me. You also went to Hong Kong and Universal Studios as a secret surprise to me.
Happy to review the proposed summer schedule. That sounds like a proposal to work together.

Sent:03/12/2024 at 09:32 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/12/2024 at 09:33 PM)
Subject:Re: Local Hoops

What i have been trying to do since the divorce filing was reach agreement with you in a way that minimized involvement of 3rd parties, but structure
an agreement that demonstrated the seriousness of what transpired and what needs to happen to move forward to provide safety for all.
After your outburst on Sunday, and continuing demand I file charges, and lack of true accountability, I stepped back and reevaluated the totality of
what transpired in the relationship and your continuing behavior to me. While I have been focused on substance abuse and protecting against that, as
that is what I recognized and was familiar with, the domestic violence aspect experienced by kids and I was truly never acknowledged. I have done
extensive reading on this subject now and how PP should be structured.
I now realize that my approach was wrong, and my initial efforts were actually short sighted, as it did not set up a plan for long term healing and
potential positive outcomes.
I will have my lawyer reach out to yours to provide our thoughts on next steps.
Message 2142 of 4024
Thanks for the amazing period leading up till July 5th. It was magic. I truly felt we were one, and on a trajectory for a happy lifetime as soulmates.
I will always have those magic memories of the best our family ever was, reaching for the stars to achieve even more together, as one happy family.
I’ll always cherish when we knew we finally got it right.
Best wishes my Queen. You were, and forever will be.
Sent:03/12/2024 at 11:07 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/13/2024 at 09:57 AM)
Subject:Re: Local Hoops
Message 2143 of 4024
Should we chat?
It feels like we’ve veered so far off track that finding our way back seems almost impossible. Our love once blazed as brightly as the stars, but that same
energy now powers a relentless cycle of hate and disdain.
Every week, I suggest trying something new, anything to help us see the good in each other again and build a life our boys would be proud to emulate.
I’ve been pushing for us to keep things civil, and you say you are tired of the endless fighting. Yet, somehow, things keep spiraling every day, with each
of us only seeing perspectives from our POV.
We both know this isn’t working, and no therapist would disagree. What do you say we take a moment, step back from the chaos on the dancefloor,
and look at where we are from the balcony?
Maybe it’s time to consider healthier paths, anything different from the mess we are in now. Every week, we agree this does not work. Every week we
still find common ground. Then every week we abandon that and fight even harder. I'd like to discuss this with a cooler head if you would.
Thanks!

From:Robert Moyer

So under your “self proclaimed, child centered” approach your plan pencils out to less than 24 hours a year. Curious to see  if the mediator or judge

So, I do nothing now?

Also, per the thoughts on Max noted below, are we following the Dr Brown plan as you propose to assert here? The last I saw was that you were
rejecting that and were coming up with a plan based on your internet browsing instead of Dr Brown's professional advice.
Letting me know what you are doing might be helpful for the children's sake.
Regarding your plan, I'd also like to know when I will actually see Adrian again.
Please advise on since you brought up the topic. Looking to co-parent with you.
Thanks!

Good Morning-
I can't seem to get an answer from you on almost anything we are trying to do together, so I pulled some of the most pressing concerns into one of our
familiar "running list" formats that works well for us. Please see below. I do need some things answered today. Have a great day!
Robotics Breakfast- I signed up for this and would like to coordinate in existing 3rd party emails but I can't reply. I have asked you 4 times now if we
Sent:03/15/2024 at 08:22 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/15/2024 at 10:24 AM)
Subject:Running List for 3/15

can coordinate our commitment. What is the plan for tomorrow?
AD visit Time- You have clawed back almost all the Dr. Brown recommended approved visits. She noted that Adrian wanted to see me even a month
ago. When do I get to see him again as she said he needed?
Restraining Order- The version that frivolously states I am a "credible threat to do physical harm" has been filed for months. What is your plan to
remedy the false public portrayal of my character?
Parenting Plan- Our journey includes five therapists and six parenting plans, beginning with the one I wrote and shared on Sept 22. No, predictability
is destructive to our kid's mental health. What are your next steps?
Spring Break- We had a plan that Dr Brown sanctioned for me to have this one. You ignored it along with the parenting plan. I proposed a healthy,
child-focused compromise. What is your response?
Dr. Brown- You said she was not able to offer an appropriate parenting plan because she was uninformed after 10 meetings. We both offered you the
opportunity to educate her. Do you plan to do that?
Returning Sonos- We communicate weekly on this, and you assure me you will get these to me. You sent me trash instead of the Sonos in January.
What are your plans to get these to me as promised?
3rd Party emails- You are blocking me from co-parenting with 3rd parties via the RO to co-parent unless you need me to reverse Adrian's SAAS
rejection, which I miraculously did. Can I participate on these?
Xfinity- Every day, I send you screen captures of the alerts you send me via Xfinity. These were the basis for your surveillance claims. You won't stop
creating the situation months later. Is this on purpose?
Drop-In- You're aware you still have drop-in audio and video capabilities to surveil me. I send you screen captures of your recent call attempts that
you deny doing. I've asked that we stop this. How do we stop?
Andy Benjamin- We agreed in writing that we would see him as our divorce counselor at Dr. Brown's recommendation. Your RO prevents us from
doing that. Are you backing out of that commitment?
OFW expectations- You have this list of questions because you read my co-parenting requests to coordinate child-centered or property-focused
topics, but don't reply. Is there a plan to replace OFW?
Please consider that I am working with you on the platform of your choice and following the agreed-upon rules of both OFW communications and a
false RO you mistakenly filed. The impact is that we are not able to co-parent in a child-centered way or resolve ongoing property situations in a
timely or amicable way.
I want to work with you to determine how we do this in the best interest of all involved and in a cost-effective way that does not require an attorney
to send an attorney the same question I already sent you. That seems frivolous, expensive, and unnecessary, so I hope we can reach a more amicable
and less expensive solution.
Please advise, and have a great day!
best
-robert

Good Morning-
I can't seem to get an answer from you on almost anything we are trying to do together, so I pulled some of the most pressing concerns into one of our
familiar "running list" formats that works well for us. Please see below. I do need some things answered today. Have a great day!

which I shared, I did not plan to attend the competition this weekend.

Ok.., "a running list" invite was sent so we save the very limited OFW minutes. If we use OFW, we are down to ten minutes for the rest of the month
so it does not make sense.
Below are my official thoughts, but let's please just keep this nice, constructive, and child or property-centered. I have no desire to fight nor do you
with me i'm sure, Christine.
Thanks!
Robotics Breakfast- I was planning to buy bagels, cream cheese, yogurt and silverware tonight. Given Max’s feedback regarding in person viewing
which I shared, I did not plan to attend the competition this weekend. <<I agreed with you several times on the attendance. This is now the 6th time I
have asked you what I need to do?>>
AD visit Time- I saw the e-mail from Lisa yesterday. Lisa asked we respond within a week. <<I would like to know this week so I can see him now. It is
in his best interest to see his father and he wants to. Beyond this week I am happy to wait for the week as noted>>
Restraining Order- I saw the e-mail from Lisa yesterday. Lisa asked we respond within a week.<<This has been months. The RO filed is false and
frivolous. Do we have to ask your lawyer to fix this, or is this something that you should do on your own because it was either a mistake or unethical?
>>
Sent:03/15/2024 at 12:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/16/2024 at 07:47 AM)
Subject:Re: Running List for 3/15

Parenting Plan- I saw the e-mail from Lisa yesterday. Lisa asked we respond within a week. <<This has gone on since September. Six times. Since I
don't expect you will ever do this at this point, can you at least let me know what your plan is prior to responding?>>
Spring Break- I disagree we arrived at Spring Break plan with Dr. Brown. I saw the e-mail from Lisa yesterday. Lisa asked we respond within a week.
<<We disagree. I will find mails on OFW discussing this. We can also speak with Dr Brown about our discussion. Either way there are no current
plans for Spring Break, so I hope we find a peaceful child focused compromise as discussed>>
Dr. Brown- Dr. Brown is not engaged for any further assistance. We have not aligned on any further assistance on what that might look like. <<We
have. It is in the last email. Do you need me to forward so you can see the next steps that she suggested? I also know you said after reading the internet
you would be crafting a new parenting plan instead of Dr. Brown's. Is that your position still?>>
Returning Sonos- The “trash” was items packed up from the guest bedroom. None came from a trash can, but in your piles. Given the dangerous
nature of where the Sonos are, I will need to analyze how to retrieve safely. <<you are talking about 1/3 of the Sonos. I have asked to take a picture
and give me the other 2/3. I would also just like to grab them as proposed. You have said every week you needed help, it was scheduled. It is never true.
Just let me do it please. This is low hanging fruit.>>
3rd Party emails- I saw the e-mail from Lisa yesterday. Lisa asked we respond within a week. <<We are on them now and I need to be able to co-parent
effectively. Please tell me what we're doing so we don not do any further further damage like the whole SAAS situation we teamed up to fix>>
Xfinity- Please provide evidence I will not stop creating the situation months later. Xfinity told me this is an impossible scenario. Please stop
monitoring our internet. <<Let's work this out
peacefully. If your contention is, I am monitoring you when you are the origin of the alerts, we can clear that up pretty quickly. But if you are still
accusing me of surveilling you, I need to take action, right?>>
Drop-In- PLEASE UNPLUG THE DEVICES. I have communicated to you on numerous occasions I do not know what is happening and have not
made any attempt to drop in on you. <<They are not plugged in. I told you that. You know that. But I can not unplug my phone, so your drop-in
calls are still showing there. I have shown you this. You are aware that you still send drop-in requests to audio and video monitoring devices that you
sent me to use. I show you this. Let's just peacefully resolve as I suggested>>
Andy Benjamin- The communication we had was that I asked you to confirm with your lawyer the RO would allow that type of communication.
Even under the modified communication protocols. Did you confirm how his plan would align with RO? <<I told you that it does not align. You
know that well and good. How can we communicate email only if by law you don't let me do that. This is not a mystery. The RO needs to afford for
us to communicate. You don't allow that.>>
OFW expectations- OFW will be the platform. <<Why aren't we going with the arrangements that you have signed off on twice as we have talked
through them at great length? We are back here chasing our tails. We need the email options we discussed with 3rd parties, to strategize about 3rd
parties, communicate with SAAS, Basketball, Robotics, etc... , and we need it to use Andy. If you are intentionally keeping me from effective
parenting, similar to the SAAS situation, I hope you will reconsider. Please work for a more effective and reasonable solution so we can serve the
children's best interests>>
Thanks Again. Looking forward to a constructive discussion!
